name: Neolithic
description:
"DISCLAIMER" :  This game is for test only, there is No Virus

The game is based on a caveman that want to find a love, but for getting the love they need to collect a bunch of a flower to give to his love one, and fight others caveman to get his lover heart.

Artist : Raxel_ Io and Mora & Olfi ;

Programmer :  Semmy;
